name: Is Bruce Almighty? Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which actress was Jim Carrey's co-star in the movie?
questions.explanation:
Jennifer Aniston.

	Over his movie career, Carrey has had his choice of Hollywood actresses. Courteney Cox co-starred in "Ace Ventura: Pet Detective" (1994), Cameron Diaz was in "The Mask" (1994), and Rénee Zellweger was alongside him in "Me, Myself & Irene" (2000).

questions.text: Which of these directed the movie?
questions.explanation:
Tom Shadyac.

	This wasn't the first time that Shadyac had called on Carrey's talents. He also directed Jim in 1994's "Ace Ventura: Pet Detective", and "Liar Liar" (1997).

questions.text: How many fingers did Bruce have on his right hand when he showed God?
questions.explanation:
7.

	God was played by Morgan Freeman. Freeman also starred in movies such as "The Shawshank Redemption", "Se7en", and "Along Came A Spider".

questions.text: Which of these 'miracles' did Bruce NOT perform during the movie?
questions.correct: He made the police department dance
options: He parted the soup in his bowl
He set a fire hydrant to spray water everywhere
He saw clothes in a window, and transferred them to himself
questions.explanation:
He made the police department dance.

	He got the police department dancing in another movie, "The Mask". All the others listed did happen in the movie, though.

questions.text: Which legendary singer played himself in this movie?
questions.explanation:
Tony Bennett.

	Crooner Tony Bennett plays himself in a restaurant, singing the song "If I Ruled the World".

TV Reporter.

	Carrey was a lawyer in "Liar Liar", a bank clerk in "The Mask", and a policeman in "Me, Myself & Irene".

questions.text: Bruce wanted the anchor job at the TV station, but who did he sabotage in order to get it?
questions.explanation:
Evan Baxter.

	Evan Baxter was played by Steven Carell. Catherine Bell played Susan Ortega, Fred Donohue was acted by Mark Keily, and Paul Satterfield played the part of Dallas Coleman.

questions.text: How many lottery winners did Bruce create in Buffalo?
questions.explanation:
400,000.

	As a result of this action, rioters went on the rampage throughout the city.

questions.text: What was Carrey's signature line during the movie?
options: "Good afternoon, good evening, and good night."
questions.explanation:
"BEAUtifil!".

	"All righty then" and "Yummy" both came from "Ace Ventura: Pet Detective", while the full signature of "The Truman Show" was "Oh, and in case I don't see you, good afternoon, good evening and good night."

questions.text: Did Bruce end up with Grace Connelly at the end of the movie?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	They finally got back together after Bruce was hit by a truck and injured. When he was doing a report for the TV station, he announced that she would be the next Mrs. Nolan. Thanks for taking this quiz.
